title._content: Image taken from page 300 of 'A Whaling Cruise to Baffin's Bay and the Gulf of Boothia. And an account of the rescue of the crew of the "Polaris." ... With an introduction by ... S. Osborn, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Whaling Cruise to Baffin's Bay and the Gulf of Boothia. And an account of the rescue of the crew of the "Polaris." ... With an introduction by ... S. Osborn, etc" Author: MARKHAM, Albert Hastings - Sir, K.C.B Contributor: OSBORN, Sherard. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10460.pp.4." Page: 300 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1874 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002385199 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
